name: reconspect
description: Laboratory for exploring visualization component architecture and specification within Resonant

scripts.uglify: cat src/reconspect/preamble.js src/reconspect/dummy.js | tee site/reconspect.js | uglifyjs -m >site/reconspect.min.js
scripts.build: npm run jade && npm run index && npm run uglify

author: Roni Choudhury
